title: The 4 Array
desc:
Post 600
- When played, this goes in your identity card.
- Instead of playing on the card pile, you can now play a red blue yellow or green card in the **4 ARRAY,** a separate card pile.
- Once you play a red, blue, yellow, and green card in the 4 array, you immediately discard down to one card and the 4 array resets.
